mapper.select: Select p.*, m.mem_name appli_name, c.company From purchase p, member m, customer c Where p.mem_id = m.mem_id and p.custcode = c.custcode Order by p.pur_date

Select p.*,c.company, m.mem_name appli_name, mgr.mem_name mgr_name From purchase p, customer c, member m, member mgr Where p.pur_date = #{pur_date} and p.custcode = #{custcode} and p.custcode = c.custcode and p.mem_id = m.mem_id and c.mem_id = mgr.mem_id
